column2:
Before heading to the ruins, he went to the spot where they'd hidden their weapons and tools,
and found them just the way they had left them.

The newly crafted weapons and tools had better performance,
but they broke quickly in use, so taking the old ones back might still be worthwhile.
Star Man viewed Precision from a distance.

The raft had been destroyed.
He couldn’t tell whether monsters had done it or if wind and rain had naturally broken it down.
Still, he couldn’t shake the feeling that *that man* had smashed it.
Star Man crept nervously into Precision.

The interior had been ransacked.
It looked as though that man had gone on a rampage.
Overcome with dread at lingering there, Star Man decided to leave immediately.
